content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity Generation at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity Distribution at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport Belt at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5) and two transport belts at positions(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities that require ingredients but having no ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the required ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines but not being connected to a power source
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power source before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using electricity groups but not being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using pipe groups but being empty
- Ensure that the pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No variables have been assigned.
